description: Proposed rear infill extension, roof extension with rear dormer and rooflights in the front roofslope, replacement windows, new openings in ground floor rear extension, and changes to external materials of the existing building.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The rooflights in the front roofslope shall be conservation type; flush fitting, narrow profile, stell rooflights with a central glazing bar.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-d1c1d5d3-7fff-392d-691d-7c16b63bd9ea"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the surrounding area.&nbsp;</span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the first occupation of the development hereby approved a minimum of one</span><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"> Swift nesting bricks and/or boxes shall be provided at or close to eaves level of the development hereby approved. The bricks/boxes shall be retained thereafter in perpetuity.&nbsp;</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><br></span>REASON: in the interests of biodiversity.</p>

<span id="docs-internal-guid-2f782016-7fff-5794-d46d-80e779f987cf"><br><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">Detailed drawings/full particulars of the proposed development showing the matters set out below must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before any work is commenced. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved which shall be implemented in full prior to the first occupation/use of the development.</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">&nbsp;i) Details of the proposed sash windows in the form of 1:10 horizontal and vertical section drawings of details showing the material, profile and dimensions of the glazing bars at their junction with the glazing units; the location and depth of the glazing units; the sash boxes with weights, pulleys and cords.</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">ii) Details of all materials to be used on the external surfaces of the building.&nbsp;</p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory, and preserves or enhances the character and appearance of the Lea Bridge Conservation Area.</p><div><br></div></span>
